titles.title: To reduce amounts available to the General Services Administration for the acquisition of new vehicles for the Federal fleet.
To reduce amounts available to the General Services Administration for the acquisition of new vehicles for the Federal fleet.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Limits the amount of funding available to the General Services Administration (GSA) for FY2012 and for each fiscal year thereafter for the acquisition of new vehicles for the federal fleet to 80% of the amount available for such vehicles for FY2011. Exempts from such limitation amounts for the acquisition of new vehicles for national security purposes.
